adventure_overview: Afloat rules, Tigers will learn how to stay safe in the water and get comfortable with being in the water. Tigers can earn this Adventure by completing the requirements OR by taking swim lessons. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved.
